body.p:
Paris Kentucky:
His Excellency Beriah Magoffin:
Governor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky:
Dear Sir:
I inclose you the Petition of a number of young gentlemen, praying the exercise of the Executive clemency -- also a line from Col Prall, concurring in their prayer --

Hoping it may be granted I remain --
Very Respectfully
John T. Croxton

"P S" Direct to me --
J, T, C,
